original: Ljungberg, Bo Alexander, rådman, stadsfogde, Alingsås, f. 21/n/n i Sto-by, Krist. 1., av Alexander L. o. Mo-rinda Ohlsson. G. 40 m, Helga Nel-son. Barn: Bodil f. 42, Claes 45. — Stud :ex. i Malmö 30, jur. kand. i Lund 38. Efter stud:ex. kont :praktik, hu-vudsakl. som korresp., i två o. ett halvt år, tingstjg. i Frosta o. Eslövs dom’S. 38-41, tjg. i Göta hovr. 41-43, hovr:-fiskal 42, andre rådman o. stadsfogde, tiHika not. publ. i Alingsås 44. Styr:-led. i Sv. idr:förb. samt HSB i Alingsås 45, suppk f. ordf. i hyresndn, suppl. i brandstyr., b3^ggn:ndn o. civilför-svarsndn samt sekr. i fritidsndn, allt i AHngsås. Sv. idr:förb. ftjt. (»Stora grabbarnas» märke).
translated: Ljungberg, Bo Alexander, magistrate, city administrator, Alingsås, b. 21/n/n in Sto-by, Krist. 1., son of Alexander L. and Morinda Ohlsson. Married in 1940 to Helga Nelson. Children: Bodil b. 1942, Claes b. 1945. — Completed secondary school in Malmö in 1930, graduated with a law degree from Lund University in 1938. After completing his studies, worked as a law clerk, mainly as a correspondent, for two and a half years. Served as a court clerk in Frosta and Eslöv district courts from 1938 to 1941, served in the Göta Court of Appeals from 1941 to 1943, appointed as a deputy magistrate and city administrator, acting notary public in Alingsås from 1944. Board member of the Swedish Sports Association and the Housing Cooperative Society in Alingsås in 1945, deputy chairman of the rental committee, deputy in the fire brigade, building committee, and civil defense committee, and secretary in the leisure committee, all in Alingsås. Received the Swedish Sports Association's "Great Guys" mark.
